text: Lloyd Cafe Cadena (22 September 1993 â€“ 4 September 2020) was a Filipino YouTuber, radio personality, and author. ==Career== Alongside being a YouTuber, he also worked as a radio DJ on 93.9 iFM hosting a program called Gabi Ng Hanash (Night of Hanash) in 2014. Cadena later moved to 90.7 Love Radio in 2017, hosting "KarLloyd" alongside fellow vlogger and DJ Kara Karinyosa. ==Death== Cadena died on September 4, 2020 at the at age 26 from cardiac arrest caused by COVID-19. His death came two weeks before his 27th birthday. == References == Category:1993 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Deaths from cardiac arrest Category:Deaths from the COVID-19 pandemic in the Philippines Category:Actors from Manila Category:LGBT actors Category:YouTubers
title: Lloyd Cadena
